settings.title: One Greeting, Two Warmths
settings.content:
When you customize a video on Say Wishes‚Äîwriting a heartfelt custom message for your loved one, or picking a song they love so much for your best friend‚Äîthis thoughtfulness quietly crosses mountains and oceans, tying two hopes closely together üåç.

In your name, we‚Äôll add a warm meal for kids in Tanzanian villages: maybe a bowl of ugali (Tanzania‚Äôs traditional corn staple) with tomato stew üç≤, or a sweet mandazi (a local fried dough treat) ü•û. This meal helps them gather enough energy for their walk to school üéí, and gets them through their busy afternoons too.

You send care to someone you care about, and through this meal, you also hand a sense of security to another little life. One choice, and it lets kindness shine equally in two worlds üí´ÊîØÊåÅÂü∫Á°ÄÂØåÊñáÊú¨ÊéíÁâà„ÄÇ
